issue.title: <frame/>: Support multiple frames in a single parent? Intended scope of frames? Use link names as frames?

content.raw:
> Question 3: The code in pull request #468 currently adds names of models, links, joints, collisions, and visuals to [...]

Is this the short-term desired functionality? Or is there time still to simplify this and only create implicit frames for links + joints, and ignore models, collisions, and visuals for now?
content.html:
Question 3: The code in pull request #468 currently adds names of models, links, joints, collisions, and visuals to [...]
